timeline.bodyText: I'd personally prefer none of these methods have Component in the names. The param and return type difference is enough. ;)

replies.bodyText: Returntype overloading isn't supported by the Java language. The JVM supported or probably supports it until today. But to keep it clean I do not recommend doing this hacky things. Remember the getOnlinePlayers "hack". There was a time where the server supported plugins using getOnlinePlayers(): Player[] and getOnlinePlayers(): Collection<? extends Player>
